title: SD Salvatierra
text:
Sociedad Deportiva Salvatierra is a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Spain">football</a> team based in <a href="Salvatierra/Agurain">Salvatierra/Agurain</a>, <a href="%C3%81lava">Álava</a> in the autonomous community of <a href="Basque%20Country%20%28autonomous%20community%29">Basque Country</a>. Founded in 1964, it plays in <a href="Divisiones%20Regionales%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20in%20the%20Basque%20Country">Regional Preferente</a>. The club's stadium is "<a href="Estadio%20Municipal%20de%20Salvatierra">Estadio Municipal de Salvatierra</a>" with a capacity of 1,000 seats.
It is a partner club of the local professional team <a href="Deportivo%20Alav%C3%A9s">Deportivo Alavés</a>.
